<script type="text/javascript" src="http://mixi.linno.jp/static/cmn/js/mixios.canvas.js"></script>
     
       <script type="text/javascript">
           var canvas = mixios.application.newCanvas('http://mixi.linno.jp', 'parking');
           
           //default debug is disabled
           canvas.enableDebug(true);
           
           //default height is 1325
           canvas.setHeight(1325);
          
           //let's go
           canvas.start();
       </script>

<style type="text/css">
	* {
		margin:0;
		padding:0;
		border:none;
	}
	</style>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="http://mixi.linno.jp/static/cmn/js/mixios.gadget-1.0-min.js"></script>
	
	<script type="text/javascript">
	    var gadget = mixios.application.newGadget('http://mixi.linno.jp', 'parking');
	    
	    gadget.setLoadingImgSrc(gadget.getHost() + '/static/cmn/img/loading/ajax_loader.gif');
	    
        gadget.enableDebug(true);
        
        gadget.registerOnLoadHandler(embedFlash);
        
        function getUserID() {
            return gadget.getOwnerId() + '*' + gadget.getViewerId();
        }

        function embedFlash() {
            var opt = {
            	id : 'parking',
                flashvars : 'gadgetloadURL=' + gadget.getHost() + '/ajax/openparking/gadetload',
                allowScriptAccess: 'always',
                height: 210,
                width: 210,
                allowFullScreen : false
            };
        
            gadgets.flash.embedFlash(gadget.getHost() + '/static/apps/parking/swf/gadget.swf?verson=4', gadget.getContainerId(), 8.0, opt); 
        }

        //start
        gadget.start();       
	</script>
